reviews.review: This is a fun horror game that has a unique play-style and has two different modes of play to switch things up to stay interesting. If you want to work as a team with strangers or friends, you can play as a survivor. If you want to play solo or don't want to deal with cooperating with anyone, you can play as killer. Once you get past the learning curve and learn how to play efficiently, it can be a fun game of skill, while you can also play casually for fun. I highly recommend this.
Very fun and not pay to win highly reccomended
i hate this game but i love thus game 10/10 WOULD RECOMMEND
if your having an amazing day then you decide you know what id really like my day to get fucked up then this is your game playing this game made me feel like dying , honestly 10/10 highly recommend

Simple on the surface but with layers of complexity. Turn the lights off in the room while you play and you will get a little creeped out. Good stuff.
Bestes Spiel der Welt. Hab es durch ein paar Twitch-Streamer kennengelernt und würde niemals wieder ohne dieses Spiel leben können, wenn ich müsste.
Apart from some BS in the game, it's pretty fun

Once you have found your favorite survivors, killer and perks the game can be fun.
A lot of trial and error went into my hours and I still need to learn a lot and still make mistakes. Sure, you can't always get the win due to camping killers or sandbagging teammates. Playing with friends is also highly fun.
A thing I also noticed is that the game is more fun if you are somewhere between competitive and just having fun and making the best of every situation :]
good............. and don't what else to say

Great game, really fun, but there is a recurring bug that causes some people to lose all of their progress, support is awful ( 6 days to respond to a ticket ), and the reimbursement for the loss of progress is less than 1/2 what was lost.

Hacking is now even more rampant after the most recent update ( Hour of the Witch ).

Определённо найлучшая игра в этом жанре,но даже у неё есть свои плюсы и минусы
Плюсы:Огромный выбор выживших и маньяков
•Большой выбор карт
•Интересная система прокачки
•Динамичный геймплей
Минусы:неадекватный баланс
•Большое количество багов
•В некоторых случаях ужасное комьюнити
В целом 8/10
jogo muito bom e divertido, todos os bugs nele ajudam para a diversão kkkk
Good game. Killers are sometimes a little much! Highly recommend for someone trying to play a game with a few friends!

game is shit, don't buy it.

Great game that gets your blood pumping in a different way than most games. Highly recommend on sale + grab a couple $5 dlcs with the killers/survivors you want. You can also unlock a few through just playing the game so don't spend money on those.

Killer perspective:
Game is fun and immersive but often tryhard, and some perks never feel good to have happen to you. Would recommend.
Dont be that guy, dont hook camp and dont tunnel, HAVE FUN ;)

可传授技能这个设定真是弱智才能想出来的，人类好技能基本就在免费角色了，屠夫这边免费角色的技能真是一言难尽，每次玩屠夫就是带着4个没用的技能和对面16紫打。一个控机技能没有，人类修的真是不亦乐乎，每次玩屠夫真是恶心自己，

не рекомендую к покупке.
только нервы испортите и бабки проебёте

I used to have lots of fun in this game, but with every patch the game gets worse and worse. The devs totally don't care about it. They don't do bugfixes at all. Just some examples: The Nurse is a teleporting killer, and a gamebreaking bug makes it so you can't teleport from a moment on in the game. This bug exists for nearly 3 years now, and they don't change it. The community also gives hints to make them know what bugs exist and what needs to be fixed. They don't do anything about that. The only thing they think of is how to make money faster, so they bring new skins and everything but never do necessary changes to keep their game alive. Killer can't hit people, dead hard being completely useless for survivors with good internet, toxicity to its maximum, they don't care. They just keep doing these things and as long as they don't change that and do something for their game, I will do nothing to support them, and I would reccomend the same to everyone. Make them know how important this is, so they finally realize they should do something for the community instead of letting their game die and not caring.
The dumbest part of it is that the developers are highly survivor sided. They would do everything for crying survivors. If you get a kill as killer in one game, you can be sure they'll nerf killer again. They also make everything they can to make sure killers don't have much synergy with their abilities. You can be happy if you manage to get 2 hooks on high mmr, but if you play survivor you will recognize, that it's really chill for you don't need much skill to win.
